sentences.sContent: They must have returned by another route.
sentences.sCn: 他们肯定是从另一条路线回来的。

sentences.sContent: ...it was another interest that led Leah to radically reinvent herself...
...As if you needed another reason to hate the gym...
...But there’s another one even more terrifying...
...but if you were talking to another person and they came up close in your personal space...
...But an accumulating body of research indicates that some distinctions between one type of elder care and another have little real bearing on how well residents do...
...the kitchen has one door into the dining room，another into the family room and a third to the outside...
...Field trips provide another opportunity to know the community...
...Our train doesn't leave for another twenty minutes...
...Today's announcement is another important step forward in improving access to a quality education...

synos.tran: 又一，另一；另外的；不同的

phrases.pCn: adv. 接连地；一个接一个地
adv. 无论如何；以某种方法
同种类中的另一个[见 such]

trans.tranOther: not the same thing, person etc, but a different one
